titles.title: Ocmulgee National Heritage Corridor Act
To establish the Ocmulgee National Heritage Corridor in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 1/14/2009--Introduced. Ocmulgee National Heritage Corridor Act - Establishes the Ocmulgee National Heritage Corridor in Georgia. Designates the Ocmulgee Heritage L.L.C. as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Corridor. Requires the Ocmulgee Heritage L.L.C. to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Corridor.
